channel.title: Marina Dyachenko on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Marina Dyachenko on Strat

item.title: Vita Nostra
item.description: A grounded yet fantastical story about a young woman, Sasha, who is selected to attend the Institute of Special Technologies. Sasha attends this mysterious college and is thrust into a world of dark academia with widespread and fantastical implications.
